subject.description: Entity ids to be examined, e.g. NCBIGene:9342, NCBIGene:7227, NCBIGene:8131, NCBIGene:157570, NCBIGene:51164, NCBIGene:6689, NCBIGene:6387

background.description: Entity ids in background set, e.g. NCBIGene:84570, NCBIGene:3630; used in over-representation tests

object_slim.description: Slim or subset to which the descriptors are to be mapped, NOT IMPLEMENTED
